category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TASK_MONITOR_SLEEP_TIME
preference.preference_description: Used to set the sleep time for the task monitor daemon. Sleep time should be an integer specifying the desired number of minutes. e.g. 30 for 30 minutes, 60 for 1 hour and 120 for 2 hours.
